DOC.brief_summary: Pain sensitivity would be associated with surgical outcomes after lumbar spine surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Pain Sensitivity on Lumbar Surgery Outcomes
DOC.criteria: 1. patients aged 4080 years 2. lumbar spinal stenosis diagnosis and scheduled spine surgery at a tertiarycare teaching institution between June 2012 and April 2013 a history of major psychiatric disorders (schizophrenia, major depression) or peripheral vascular disease any concurrent serious medical condition that would cause disability or decreased general health status such as sepsis or cancer.
